string.name: about_us
string.br: The GoodManServices is a new business concerned with\n
quality facility management services to homes,offices\n
other business in the Copenhagen area of Denmark\n
Through generous human capital investments, TGS will exceed our customer\'s expectations.\n
We will be servicing the wealthy single-income households and affluent two-income households.\n
Our targeted customers are willing to pay a premium for our service because of the \n
high level of professionalism and trustworthiness that we offer, not replicated by any of our competition\n
